profile: I am a tech-driven Computer Engineering student passionate about software development. With hands-on experience in web development and real-time systems, I enjoy building innovative projects that solve real-world problems. My involvement in Google Developer Groups has expanded my technical expertise, particularly in front-end development. I am eager to collaborate, learn, and contribute to projects that push the boundaries of technology.

highlights: Directed the frontend engineering team, establishing rigorous coding standards and scalable architecture patterns to ensure code maintainability and consistency.
Architected high-performance web applications using React and Astro, optimizing component modularity for organization-wide projects.

Engineered automated CI/CD workflows using Github Actions to streamline deployments into the AWS ecosystem, utilizing S3 for static pages, CloudFront for content delivery, and Route 53 for DNS management.

experience.organization: Google Developer Groups on Campus PUP
highlights: Engineered scalable internal organization platforms, including the GDG Photobooth and ID System, utilizing Next.js for server-side rendering and Firebase for real-time data management.

Designed and delivered a 'Zero to Hero' technical curriculum for 150+ student cadets, guiding participants from fundamental HTML/CSS/JavaScript through to full-stack development with React and Express.js.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate web solutions for campus events, ensuring cross-browser compatibility and system reliability during high-traffic periods.

experience.organization: University Teaching and Learning Development Office - PUP Manila
experience.role: Learning Management System (LMS) Technical Support Intern
highlights: Supported and maintained PUP's Moodle LMS, addressing user access and course issues.
Applied PHP and MySQL to explore Moodle’s codebase and develop automation scripts for LMS-related administrative tasks.
Assisted with faculty workshops and seminars on LMS and AI tools, including technical support and documentation creation.

projects.name: AWS CertEval
details: Automated the distribution of participation certificates by building a secure verification pipeline using Python and FastAPI.
Engineered a validation logic that gates certificate access behind membership verification and mandatory survey completion, ensuring data integrity.
Streamlined the post-event operations workflow, eliminating manual certificate generation for club administrators.

projects.name: IslaGrid (Meralco IDOL Hackathon Finalist)
details: Secured Top 11 Finalist status among 48 teams by pitching a community-driven renewable energy ecosystem to Meralco executives.
Developed a platform enabling the community to harness the location’s renewable energy potential, utilizing AI-assisted chatbot for clean energy access and application.

projects.name: AWS Skill Builder LMS
details: Developed and implemented a centralized, gamified Learning Management System (LMS) for the AWS Cloud Club, effectively replacing manual tracking with an automated, unified platform to streamline member learning.
Deployed the solution on AWS, integrating secure authentication and resource management to support student upskilling tracks.
Optimized data retrieval for assignments and peer recognition, significantly improving user engagement and resource accessibility.

projects.name: GDG ID Platform
details: Built an automated digital ID generation system allowing members to render and download branded ID cards via HTML5 Canvas and PDF conversion.
Implemented secure admin workflows using Firebase Admin Auth and rate limiting to protect contact form submissions.
Integrated Google Sheets API for real-time member verification ('Smart Search'), reducing manual cross-checking of registration lists.

projects.name: CPE Fair Web Application
details: Designed an immersive, 'Genshin Impact'-themed event management system with a real-time game leaderboard, enhancing attendee engagement.
Orchestrated the full-stack development using Express.js for backend logic and Supabase for real-time score updates during the university fair.

projects.name: Face Recognition with Attendance and Email System
details: Developed a Tkinter-based GUI for an attendance system utilizing OpenCV and Face Recognition for real-time facial detection.
Integrated Pillow for image processing and smtplib for automated email notifications, ensuring seamless log file delivery to Gmail.

projects.name: AWS - TedxPup Challenge
details: A web application challenge project for the inital requirements for AWSCC Application. Developed using vanilla JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.

projects.name: Isko-Chat Ai
details: An app built to assist students in finding scholarships and educational resources. A collaborative project and I mainly focus on front-end and back-end development.

projects.name: Sparkfest 2025
details: A web application for managing and organizing events for Sparkfest 2025: PUP GDG Hackathon Event. Developed using React and TailwindCSS.

projects.name: Password Manager
details: A CRUD application for securely managing and storing passwords. Mainly explores user authentication and data encryption.

projects.name: Alertech Web Dashboard
details: A web dashboard system to monitor realtime fire and gas leak detection. A collaborative project focusing on IoT and real-time data processing. I focused on the front-end development.

projects.name: DSA Visualizer
details: A web application to visualize and understand various data structures and algorithms. A school final project showcasing my skills in React and data structures.

projects.name: SCAM App
details: A Student Curricular Activity Management app to manage student activities. A school final project mainly focused on full-stack Python development.

certifications.title: DataCamp Scholar
certifications.note: Awarded for excellence in data engineering through Data Engineering Philippines.
